title: Two victories tonight with one thing in common
body: Both against Bards.....seriously, can anyone do well with this champ?  Some of the highlights of tonight include a well timed ult by Bard on our team while we were standing on the enemy Rumble's ult and a magical journey that led his team into a 4 man Leona ult.  I'm not even gonna talk about what happened to Jinx when Bard went off to roam....
